bibl.title: The Karanis Housing Project: A New Approach to an Old Excavation.
Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt

bibl.note: The Karanis Housing Project will attempt to produce a unified synthesis of all the finds associated with a small, select number of buildings on the site, understood diachronically through the various occupations phases. - From the Past. - Toward the Future. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Andrew T. Wilburn, R. James Cook & Jennifer Gates-Foster, The Karanis Housing Project: A New Approach to an Old Excavation.

Terry G. Wilfong (ed.), with the assistance of Andrew W.S. Ferrara, Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt = Kelsey Museum Publication 7 (Ann Arbor, 2014) pp. 157-160.

The Karanis Housing Project will attempt to produce a unified synthesis of all the finds associated with a small, select number of buildings on the site, understood diachronically through the various occupations phases. - From the Past. - Toward the Future. - Conclusion.
